description:
Pairs Puzzle: ABC 123 is a classic matching pairs game where the player must flip the cards to find all the matching pairs. A fun and interactive way of learning, the game helps to develop fine motor skills, hand eye coordination, logical thinking skills and can also be used as a tool to help develop vocabulary.

The game is split into three categories:
- Lowercase letters a – z
- Uppercase letters A – Z
- Numbers 1 - 20

Each time you play, the cards are randomly selected from the chosen category and laid out in a random order giving 1000’s of possible game variations and hours of fun! The game keeps track of your score and plays a sound each time a correct pair is matched. When all pairs are found the player receives a round of applause.

It is believed that shape recognition and matching skills play an important role in mathematical development. Matching is also an important skill for young children to develop because it is an essential pre-reading skill.

The game also contains buttons to reset the current game or load a new random game from the current category.

The game contains four difficulty modes from very easy to difficult:
- 3 pairs
- 6 pairs
- 9 pairs
- 12 pairs

The game has been designed to appeal to young children and the letters and numbers have been designed using a child friendly font which aids in learning the correct letter and number formation. The letters and numbers have each been given a bright and engaging colour which will appeal to the child. However, this classic matching pairs game can be enjoyed by people of all ages!

--------------------
